lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I like the fact that Kiva allows me to help others across the world make a life for themselves.

lenders.name: Michel V.
lenders.loan_because: We are in this world  to help each other if we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a french restaurant.

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: From those to whom much has been given much is to be expected.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.occupational_info: I teach art to urban high school students in a free after school program.

lenders.name: Brigitte & Werner E.

We can help so much with a little bit of money. 
Isn´t it wonderful??
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in an insurance and have
1 husband and 1 daughter with 15 years.

lenders.name: Ida
lenders.loan_because: I can and therefore I should

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because:
it is fun!

It is also an honor to be a part of such a meaningful investment!

"A new command I give you: Love one another.  As I have loved you, so you must love one another.  By this all men will know that you are my disciples..."
--Jesus

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Lending via Kiva is a great way to make a positive contribution to the betterment of mankind. Given the ability to do so, why would one not participate?
lenders.occupational_info: During my working years I designed mobile radio communication equipment.  In retirement I am trying to document some of the history of radio communication.

lenders.name: Roger Claessen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals
lenders.occupational_info: Business consultancy to change and optimize working processes and supporting IT systems

lenders.name: Miranda
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my blessings.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: A good exercise for the heart is to bend down and help another up.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I raise funds to help young people in the UK understand and care for the environment.

lenders.name: Richard and Tawanna
lenders.occupation: Him: Software Engineer Her: Creative Homemaker
lenders.loan_because: Basically we want to help others in need. Helping others with a greater need gives us an unshakable joy. $25.00 is less than a tank of gas nowadays! The creators of Kiva.org have come up with a brilliant way to reach those we wouldn't. We are glad to be a part of it. Please spread the word!
lenders.occupational_info: Richard is a Software Engineer for a large company. He also does Independent Software Development. Tawanna is an Independent Graphic Designer with a recent interest in Photography. We are also a home schooling family. Both have a Bachelors Degree and place a high value on education. You may see Tawanna's portfolio of work by the website. Tawanna also has a  photo blog at http://bytesoflight.blogspot.com/

lenders.name: Ursula
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves her/his dreams to come true. Kiva makes a world of difference- literally. Plus, I'm so blessed, how can I not give?

lenders.name: Turner Family
lenders.loan_because: My family and I want to help others make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I think it's an amazing way to let others put your money to work while bettering their own lives.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate to have so much and want to help those that have so little.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom to three great boys.  I homeschool my children and love educating them myself.  I like to garden and I am working on a vegetable garden.  We are vegetarians and my boys sure like to eat their veggies.

lenders.name: Ehren
lenders.loan_because: Of all the time I spend on the Internet, Kiva may be the most worthwhile.
lenders.occupational_info:
fascinated by life
intrigued by people
work allows me to enjoy more of both.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I've always had the support of others around me.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in entrepreneurs and help them grow their businesses in the retail & consumer space.

lenders.name: Antje
lenders.whereabouts: valle gran rey Santa Cruz de Tenerife
lenders.loan_because: ì am living on the canarian islands and here we can see every day the boatpeople coming from africa.
lenders.occupational_info: owner of a t-shirt shop

lenders.name: Andrew, Rebecca & Bailey
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to accomplish all that they dream, support their families with perseverance and hard work, educate their children, and ultimately be in a position to help others to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales & marketing executive, and an aspiring entrepreneur.  I pursue smart business opportunities, create and sell products, seek out customers and service my customers so that they may also expand their businesses and livelihood.

lenders.name: Jacqui
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to realise their dream and thanks to Kiva I have been given the opportunity to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I live in a small rural town and love to travel overseas when I can. I really enjoy meeting people of different nationalities and cultures.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: God continues to bless me every day and the only way to thank him is by paying it forward.

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: It's another way of helping.

lenders.name: Thor Christensen
lenders.loan_because: The world has too many poor people. I am fortunate enough to have money to spare. I want to give poor people a chance to make a better life for themselves. Thank you, kiva.org team, for giving me this opportunity.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: Life has given me many opportunities, it is only fair that others get some as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I study biology at university. I hope to become a doctor in the future.

lenders.name: Maxine & Camille
lenders.loan_because: because as a women I wanted to help other women who are not as fortunate as women in the USA.  I feel every women in the world deserves a chance to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I was an office manager when I did work. Now I am at home enjoying my retirement with my husband.

lenders.name: Madelyn
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I think that Kiva can help others who are less fortunate than we are, and you make a difference in their life.

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find information.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children how to read and write well.

lenders.name: Shivam
lenders.loan_because: I have the money and want to lend it to domeone who needs it
lenders.occupational_info: I study at the moment

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I want to raise the lowest standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at a university.  I work at a store that sells board games.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: our hope is that these loans give a shared opportunity and social justice over time to a small region not just to an individual.
lenders.occupational_info:
I design and then build electrical projects for hospitals and industrial facilities.  An example of a project would consist of installing an emergency system using multiple gas driven generators to support critical equipment during an electrical power outage.

I have 4 children and each of them know they can have any occupation they want but it needs to involve helping people!

lenders.name: Ines
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to make a living for themselves and this is an awesome way to help others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the sector of renewable energies  ... a job, that makes me very happy.

lenders.name: Eat Free All Week Team
lenders.loan_because: We have a beautiful daughter adopted from Guatemala.  On our visit there, I was amazed at the ingenuity and hard work of people doing everything they can to support their families.

lenders.name: Cesca
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance!

lenders.name: Kunal and Nisha
lenders.loan_because: We want to help support others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: We collect bottles and cans, and recycle them for money. We decided to use 100% of this money to help charities.

lenders.name: Julian
lenders.loan_because:
I feel blessed and I want to give back.
I believe that improving the lives of poor women is the best way to bring down the rate of human population growth, preserve wildlife, and promote peace.

lenders.name: marilou
lenders.loan_because: i want to help build the community for better life, prevent poverty and develop faith in God of Israel
lenders.occupational_info: i wish to to help the community live in accordance with God´s will, one mind, one body, one faith, one spirit, one baptism, one Lord

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: These people in need are asking for our help

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I think entrepreneurs around the world deserve a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Full time college student and entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Jennifer & Jacob
lenders.loan_because: We feel it is right to help out those who are less fortunate than us.
lenders.occupational_info: Jennifer helps people understand their medications and take them correctly.  Jacob manages a large restaurant that seats almost 600 people.

lenders.name: Déo
lenders.loan_because: Help people through the world is amazing.

lenders.name: Ty,Glen,von,gil,sam,tobi
lenders.loan_because: because we have been self employed most of our married life.  We know how tough it can be,  but for us as a  family it has always been the good choice.  There is a freedom with owning your own business...
lenders.occupational_info:
Plumber...  I wish I could said we installed flushing toilets, and running water, but we want so much more than that in houses in North america.
gardening: my favorite. pull weeds, cut the grass, and harvest the herbs, salad greens, veggies and more.
playing guitar: a few of my kids play their guitars, and sing at farmers markets.  They really enjoy the sound of music and how it brightens everyones day.

lenders.name: Micki
lenders.loan_because: It's important to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Have an online school with low cost courses that run 6 times a year.

lenders.name: Umoja
lenders.loan_because: I can. And it seems like a good idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I process (decontaminate, package/prepare, and sterilize) instruments used in sterile, surgical procedures.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: it's an easy, effective way to make a difference. What a great way to support people who need it. Best of all, the loans are interest free, which means that people on both sides don't lose anything and gain a whole lot more. Kiva is such a beautiful idea

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: This is the forefront of of economic evolution!
lenders.occupational_info: i help manufacture electronic devices that bridge the gap between technology and life

lenders.name: John & Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I want to help people make a living.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are retired but donate our time for worthy causes.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.occupation: President of a Gardner Green Energy
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I am the President of a Geo- Thermal Power Company

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's the Christian thing to do.  I don't go to church often, but I've been thinking how we as individuals can help someone in a developing nation succeed.  We're pretty spoiled here in Canada and we have so much to be thankful for: a stable government, a decent economy and a multi-cultural society that would make anyone proud to be a part of.  I'm also thankful that GOD has given me a talent to draw and produce art.
lenders.occupational_info: I do web graphics, website design and broadcast graphics, plus print graphics when needed.

lenders.name: Mark and Erica
lenders.loan_because: it is our birthday present to each other.
lenders.occupational_info: Mark works in Marketing for Peugeot, a French car manufacturer and Erica is a Remedial Massage Therapist with her own business

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I want to support hard-working people who've probably had less opportunity than me. And I think its really cool to be connected like this to someone on the other side of the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for charitable organizations, either by supporting their volunteers or by helping them share what they do with the world.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: We want to empower people to overcome poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: We building housing for homeless people.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: EXHALE
lenders.loan_because: As entrepreneurs ourselves we understand the challenges of starting up and growing businesses.  Building your own businesses not only increases your income and standard of living but your sense of self worth and purpose.   We hope to help others achieve their own dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: EXHALE designs and builds luxury tropical villas in South East Asia.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the computer to order products, pay bills and make sure things are kept in order.

lenders.name: Cecilia
lenders.loan_because: We can do no great things, only small things with great love. ~ Mother Teresa
lenders.occupational_info: I write about how my family is trying to live a simpler, greener life.

lenders.name: Deda
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: Seems like a cool way to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I do a lot of sitting and typing on my computer.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people  that want to help themselves.....There are no hand outs here......

lenders.name: Mitsuko
lenders.loan_because: l want to be a part of someone's dream and life.  l like Kiva's idea, because we can do an actual help to the people who want to take an action.  Let's stay together in the positive circle.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a dancer more than 10 years.  Now l'm teaching Gyrotonic and giving a Thai Yoga Massage in NYC.  And also l just started to work for a Japanese music web magazine as an editor/translator.   I'd like to share my experience and exchange good vibrations with others!

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: “Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it.” John D.Rockefeller
lenders.occupational_info: creating needs and meeting those needs

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: even though it's a small amount of money, I can still make a valuable contribution to someones life
lenders.occupational_info: Health & Lifestyle consultant

lenders.name: Aideen
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together and helping others brings me joy.
lenders.occupational_info: I have always helped and sometimes taught people of all ages, genders, ethnicities, disabilities, religions, and/or unfortunate circumstances to overcome blocks in their life's road.

lenders.name: Elizabeth Newmarket NH
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others work their way out of poverty
lenders.occupational_info: As a retiree I am involved in working in a program for people who are homeless and on the board of a community health center.  As an occupational therapist, I know that doing things that help people achieve their goals are very important for health and well-being.

lenders.name: Peerlo
lenders.loan_because: We are in a position to do so & therefore we should.

lenders.occupational_info: I just completed my bachelor's in public relations and am currently looking for a fulfilling position in the San Diego area

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I'm very fortunate to live in a great country like Australia, and I want to pass on some of my good fortune to those who are less fortunate.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful program and I am grateful for the opportunity to participate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on movies.

lenders.name: susan

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: Let us love one another.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.occupational_info: I help make computer animated films.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: it is important to be provide direct and immediate financiall help to people so they can achieve their small business goals
lenders.occupational_info: My role typically involves analyzing business problems and creating solutions to those problems. This can involve process improvement, software implementation and software redesign.

lenders.name: Eowyn
lenders.loan_because: doing so feels like a small step towards making the world a better place, a usually overwhelming thought.  And the stories are great.  I hope to be able to loan many more times.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in training as a holistic health coach and massage therapist.  My current job is to manage a small sales and distribution company in Europe for children's music boxes.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: a small act on my behalf has a large impact on the lives of others with this program. We are one people, and must help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze the loan requests of non profits and cities for essential community facilities in rural areas

lenders.name: Emmelkamp Family
lenders.loan_because: The Emmelkamps stand for Truth, Virtue, Gratitude, and Humility. We love and uplift everyone. We enjoy working and having lots of fun together. (Our family mission statement)
lenders.occupational_info: Raising 6 kids

lenders.name: olivia and dominic
lenders.loan_because: It helps us feel connected to the world and we want to help the world be a better place.

lenders.name: Charlie and Katie
lenders.loan_because:
3 Reasons why we loan:

1. We want to help.  We know that what we have to offer is not much but our hope is that our decision to commit financial support to someone in need will encourage others to do the same.

2. We hate the Paris Hilton/Hollywood/money is life kind of mentality.  We think Kiva represents the exact opposite of that mentality.

3. Its really cool.
lenders.occupational_info:
I, Charlie, am currently an unemployed attorney looking for work.

Katie is a sign language interpreter for the deaf and hard of hearing.  She interprets doctor's office visits, business meetings, telephone conversations and other things so that deaf people can communicate effectively with hearing people.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I love Peru. I also like to see woman do well.
lenders.occupational_info: I give Prenatal Care.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: ...life isn't fair and it truly is better to give than receive.

lenders.name: Steven and Shannon
lenders.loan_because: It's a gift that keeps on giving...
lenders.occupational_info: We are serving as Peace Corps Volunteers in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, West Indies.  We teach life skills to secondary school drop-outs, remedial reading, and help with the development of community groups.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Beyond the fear is freedom.

lenders.name: Corina
lenders.loan_because: I care.  When we all realize the oneness of everything we'll all HAVE to do something.  This is something.

lenders.name: Chad & Cathy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a manufacturer of industrial products. I work with our distributors to train and sell.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to participate positively in the world
lenders.occupational_info: Helping organizations manage their Internet presence.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.occupation: Digital Marketing Consultant and Public Speaker
lenders.loan_because: I care about people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand the Internet as a tool to promote themselves and their businesses.

lenders.name: Yvette
lenders.loan_because: I want to help real people in a personal and meaningful way which Kiva allows me to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Testing new medicines

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: although I can't change the world, I can change the life of one person at a time.  This is a small world after all.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve my country in the silent ranks of the United State Marine Corps.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I'm fascinated by how directly Kiva benefits those in need. Being part of  realizing the hopes and plans of each Recipient is a very happy element of my life.
lenders.occupational_info: My recorded voice is used for training, commercials, humor and more.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do!  And it makes so much sense.... One person helping another directly.  Even though we live worlds apart, we all share similar desires, challenges and opportunities.  If I can help in this small way, it only makes sense.  Peace!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a shoe store in the Chicago area.  We sell Birkenstock footwear and I love what I do.  I realize how lucky I am, and I give thanks for my blessings every day!

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I care about people
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student at the University of Nebraska Lincoln

lenders.name: Gulf Coast Council RPCVs
lenders.loan_because: We understand the value of availability of capital in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of returned Peace Corps volunteers in the Houston-Galveston Area of Texas.  We promote Peace Corps and raise money for Peace Corps projects around the world.

lenders.name: betsy
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to share ones blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a vehicle/passenger ferry.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and we are called help others.

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that we should help one another.  We are so fortunate here in the U.S. and we need to help those who need a hand up.  It is like a ripple effect; it goes out from YOU to the next person, then THEY pass it on.

We ARE ALL ONE people....

PASS IT ON...
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to make a difference in the world by supporting the small farmers and to educate everyone about the impact they have on the environment and each other. I also promote peace and acceptance of all cultures, because we are all ONE PEOPLE of this Earth.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.occupational_info: eating frozen treats, learning about the Revolution but trying to figure out how to be more effective than that

lenders.name: j.b
lenders.loan_because: I want to support individual grass roots initiative not institutional  programming.

lenders.name: Felicia
lenders.occupation: high school English teacher for immigrant students

lenders.name: Jennifer Donahue
lenders.loan_because: "If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other" -Mother Theresa

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I have always been fortunate enough to receive help me when I needed it.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: I have the fortune of living in a developed country and I feel a responsibility to help others who work very hard yet don't have the same opportunities.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much. If I can help make a difference by letting someone make use of what I have - it blesses me so much more!

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: I am passionate about eradicating poverty on our planet and empowering people to create change.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to use finance and property to become financially independant.

lenders.name: Yvonne

lenders.name: Zafar

lenders.occupational_info: Working to improve reliability of computer chips

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a doctor.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: Tikkun Olam -- healing the world.

lenders.name: Judd
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out people who don't have much money.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is school.

lenders.name: yamada
lenders.loan_because:
The water of one drop will become a large river before long.
The self-performed action has only only power of one drop.
However, it is believed that a global activity of KIVA leads us to the achievement of the large river without fail.
It doesn't give it up even if there will be a target for which we hope in the far future.
Because our behavior is connected with people all over the world.
And because it is the one by not the interest but a human will the connection.
The action is worthy of us. It has the boast there.
lenders.occupational_info:
I keep working though I retired once.
The body is still put on the environment of the interest for life though the retirement age is passed, and it stepped forward to the second life.
It will have hope very much when the life of the environment for which oneself hopes has extended hugely still in the future though it is sad.
Anyway, the god doesn't desert the end no matter it is what.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: it directly helps the people - no overhead, no checkbook charity. Real funding, real people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Architecture student at the University of Toronto in Toronto, Canada

lenders.name: Acquire Hope
lenders.loan_because: We believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed in life and sometimes all that is needed is a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: The Acquire Hope Foundation is about acquiring hope for those that seek empowerment and their full potential.  Everyone deserves a chance to be all they can be.

lenders.name: Ami
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.  It is a way to feel like I am making a difference in the life of someone and help ease their struggle.  I am a fan of the micro-loan, it seems the right way to get help out to the folks that really need it.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to help support entrepreneurs building their dreams and livelihood.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company designs and builds television stations and systems.

lenders.name: Bernd

lenders.name: Jakob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm looking for a job in the marketing/media branch.

lenders.name: Mick
lenders.loan_because: There is no greater gift I can receive than to help someone and watch them suceed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people choose good and healthy foods to eat. I teach them the earth provides us with the foods and medicines we need and that not all foods are good for our bodies.

lenders.name: Gary & Jolijn
lenders.loan_because: We have travelled to many places all around the world and seen exactly how our money can be used to help people build a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: we will contribute to support people who want to be on her own.
lenders.occupational_info: martin is designing clean rooms and constructing pharmaceutical processes and factories; my wife is an insurance and investment expert

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: My sister was thoughtful enough to give me a gift certificate to Kiva, I already donate to various organizations such as Children international and Heifer, this is a perfect fit for me.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching World and European History I try to get my students to think about others in the world and that the world is shrinking we are all connected.

lenders.name: Venkat
lenders.loan_because: The biggest problem in the developing world is the lack of opportunities. And I believe that micro-finance is an excellent tool for creating these opportunities. I became a member of Kiva because I believe in "union gives strength".
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Transportation Engineer and I help in designing traffic systems for safe and efficient movement of people and goods.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I feel honored to be a part of helping someone put an idea that will help themselves and their country into practice.
lenders.occupational_info: I look at political and legal situations in foreign countries for investors interested in investing abroad.

lenders.name: Annelie
lenders.loan_because: It ´s a good idea to help people in the world.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy way of helping others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: It is great to give someone a fresh start in life and become self sufficient. We have our own small business in Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: Fine art and graphic art relating to print media.

lenders.name: Janel
lenders.loan_because: people everywhere are in need.

lenders.name: Jennifer James
lenders.loan_because: helping others is a way of life. Where would the world be if we didn't spread a little love by doing good?
lenders.occupational_info: Mom blogger, web director, freelance writer

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: it's the best way to help people without enabling/ perpetuating poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying business and engineering.

lenders.name: Rob and Patricia
lenders.loan_because: Ms. Dibble is involved and sent us an email invitation. We consider ourselves blessed and wanted to share.

lenders.name: Andreas Hobi
lenders.loan_because: I love this idea and I am quite sure this is the best way to help these people.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with Switzerland’s biggest travel and transport company (rail.ch).

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: It feels wonderful to help empower people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Maria & Ian
lenders.loan_because: We need to raise the standard of living around the planet and empower small business owners.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children about ecology, the interdependencies of all life and how the actions they choose impact others and the planet.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: people deserve an opportunity to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: It is clear that hard working people in various parts of the globe benefit enormously from these loans. In this small way, I can make a big difference.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: If nothing we do matters, then all that matters is what we do. Because, if there is no bigger meaning, then the smallest act of kindness is the greatest thing in the world.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because:
I think microfinance is a great tool to empower the citizens of the world.

I was a Kiva Fellow in Peru in 2008 and had an incredible experience learning about and from the women microentrepreneurs of Manuela Ramos.  Check out my personal blog from Peru below.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work for TransFair USA, the Fair Trade organization in the United States. Fair Trade Certification empowers farmers and farm workers to lift themselves out of poverty by investing in their farms and communities, protecting the environment, and developing the business skills necessary to compete in the global marketplace.

lenders.name: Lindi
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit counts.  Putting someone's destiny in their own hands is a great gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a wide range of disciplines to effectively execute projects. I would say I am a Jill of many trades, and master of quite a few!

lenders.name: Shahrooz
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do! micro-finance is the key to creating self-sufficient communities. kiva makes it so easy to find people and projects you're passionate about and to help support those individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently graduated from UC Irvine and currently work as Executive Assistant to the Mayor of Irvine, California. I also work with The Africa Project - an Irvine based non-proft organization that works to provide South Africa AIDS orphans with basic necessities such as food, education, and health care.

lenders.name: Øivind
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe that small steps made by many can eventually make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: Optimist and realist, looking for answers

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I have seen first hand the good that a little help in the right place at the right time can do. I support the entrepreneurial spirit wherever it is found and I believe in its ability to make life a little better for us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I make documentary films that are seen on television in the United States.

lenders.name: Cyn
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to make their way in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: To make a difference in the world whatever way we can...that is what is most important.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.occupation: Office Manager / Human Resources for Nonprofit
lenders.loan_because: I understand the desire to become an entrepreneur and want to assist others with making their dreams come true, and bettering their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit organization that provides mentorship programs for children. I'm also in the process of starting my own business to help connect like-minded people to inspire and empower individuals to be more and do more, effecting positive change.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't you help if you can?

lenders.name: courtenay
lenders.loan_because: when I was a little girl, my family hit hard times for a few years. Friends helped us get back on our feet l am a product of helping hands, and now have more than enough. I am passing it on to others with love and joy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an actor and producer and also work with several non-profits in my spare time.

lenders.name: DENISE
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great idea. You feel connected to the entrepreneur by making a direct loan as little as $25 to them. You can even use Paypal, so none of your financial information is given. Check out the You Tube video for additional information: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MXk4GUGXNTQ

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur who believes in making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites and get excited about social media.  I also am trying to inspire more people to join  www.KivaNewYork.com and support New York's efforts on Kiva.org!

lenders.name: Isabelle
lenders.loan_because: I love that other can benefit from my loan and I find that because of organizations like KIVA, the world can become a better place!  I am very happy to have found out about KIVA

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: that progress should always be defined on a global scale
lenders.occupational_info: I study the evolution of galaxies that formed when the Universe was approximately 10% its current age.

lenders.name: Thinkfree Media
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Erin

lenders.occupational_info: I help sick children get the nutrition they need to heal and get better.

lenders.name: Family Fisher
lenders.loan_because: My family chose to get involved with micro financing to do something meaningful and helpful for others with money inherited from our parents.

lenders.name: Edward and Ann
lenders.loan_because: I continue to loan because I have seen the difference it makes in lives. I am serving as a Kiva Fellow. This work makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in the world of investments and client management. 
My wife is a dentist who loves helping people.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: To set an example for my kids
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and do research that examines the socio-cultural impacts of tourism

lenders.name: Marion

lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician.  I've been a church, community and school music teacher.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I love people, and to show others that complete strangers are willing to help out.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because:
Give what you have. To someone, it may be better than you dare to think. 
Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

lenders.name: Valbona
lenders.loan_because: I want to support small businesses and initiatives in other countries, especially where the people cannot afford to play the games of its system.

lenders.name: IRENE
lenders.loan_because: to help myself and family get back on our feet with finances. i have 3 children. we have VERYlimited income. Work full time. and some bills need to be paid, and more importantly to get my 2 kids back in school. If you can Help please ANYthing would be greatly appreciated towards my childrens education. 2 and 3 yr old.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others. i cant help financially at this point, but i am willing to do what it takes to get back on our feet, and i am a very CARING person.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help women have better lives

lenders.occupational_info: I manage social media for companies

lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time english teacher in a middle school ,work 8 hrs a day and have weekends and summer&winter holidays,i go to traning center to do parttime job in spare time to collect my master degree tuition fee.

lenders.occupational_info: I help maintain an oil refinery

lenders.name: Arif

lenders.name: Conni

lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a chance.

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.name: Chloe

lenders.name: Khoi
lenders.loan_because:
I am so very bless to be able to Vượt Biên and now has the opportunities to assist.

Khôi rất hân hạnh được giới thiệu đến Kiva sau khi xem chương trình TV tên là Oprah cách đây vài năm.  Khôi vừa mới đi Việt Nam mới về lại Canada.  Đất nước Việt Nam yêu dấu còn nghèo nhưng con người Việt Nam nói chung là rất cần cù, dể tánh và hiếu khách.  Bao nhiêu niềm thương non nước!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work as a global help desk specialist, whom helps other people with their computer problems.  I love to share, assist people so very much.

Khôi làm cho hảng của gốc Mỹ nhưng trụ sở tại Canada.  Khôi rất thích đem lại lợi ích cho mọi người, trong hảng làm, hay là trong gia đình, hoặc bạn bè mến yêu.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: as an American I have more than I need. I want to share some of that with people in other countries who need the resources.

lenders.name: Jackie
